Safety: SW collaboration with PICU Unit Charge RN for case discussion specific to ongoing visitor concerns and current Visitor Restriction whereby only mother and father may visit bedside.  Per discussion, current Visitor Restriction will be maintained. SW met with mother at bedside.  Mother asking if the visitor restriction could be lifted at this time.  SW informed mother that due to ongoing visitor issues discussed with mother and youth's visitors, the current visitor restriction will be ongoing at this time.  Only mother and father are permitted visitation.
